The study perform adult subject age 18 70 year age . Approximately 360 subject receive SOC treatment randomise 1:1 ratio receive fix intravenous dose anifrolumab placebo every 4 week total 13 dos ( Week 0 Week 48 ) , primary endpoint evaluate Week 52 visit . Investigational product administer intravenous ( IV ) infusion via infusion pump minimum 30 minute , every 4 week .
